name: Appverse
body:
![Appverse](http://www.google.com/a/cpanel/appverse.mobi/images/logo.gif)

## Overview

Mobile application development, rich internet applications, user experience and big data are among our priorities; currently, GFT Appverse has published two key assets to advance with our open innovation objectives;

![Appverse organization](http://appversed.files.wordpress.com/2012/12/theappverseproject2.png?w=1024&h=501)

* **[Appverse Mobile](http://appverse.github.com/appverse-mobile/)** – A multi-platform mobile development framework allows developers to use HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3 and to leverage native functionalities of a mobile device to build apps from a common codebase.
* **[Appverse Web](http://appverse.github.com/appverse-web/)** – A multi-frontend technology capable web application framework incorporating the best-of-breed open source stack to meet the challenges of secure and robust server-side service development, integration and delivery.

We welcome individuals and organizations to accompany us in this journey that we believe to be essential for us all. 

For more information about these projects, please refer to either [Appverse Mobile](http://appverse.github.com/appverse-mobile/) or [Appverse Web](http://appverse.github.com/appverse-web/) project sites. For more information about [The Appverse Project](http://appverse.org) as a whole, please refer to our [informational](http://appverse.org) site. For information about contributing with the project, please refer to the [Appverse Public License](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/) page and the [contribute](http://appverse.org/contribute/) page on our site.

## Authors & Contributors

### Mentor & Administrator
* @carloslozano - Carlos Lozano <carlos@appverse.org>

### Committers
* Please refer to the [team page](https://github.com/Appverse?tab=members) for more information on official committers.

## Support & Contact

This project is open-source and supported by the [team of committers](https://github.com/Appverse?tab=members) and the community. If you require commercial support for your application, please contact <sales@appverse.org> to discuss your needs. We recommend you check out our mailing lists and forums for other information and development support.

## Licenses & Legal

Appverse is licensed under the Appverse Public License (APL) based on the Mozilla Public License V2.0. You can get a copy of the license [here](http://appverse.org/legal/appverse-license/). 

Copyright © 2012 Appverse™. Appverse® is a registered trademark of GFT Appverse S.L. Apple, Apple logo and iOS are copyright and trademarks of Apple, Inc.  Android logo, Android and Google are copyright and trademarks of Google, Inc. All other logos and trademarks are copyright of their respective owners. In case of issues relating to copyrights and trademarks, please contact <legal@appverse.mobi> to request the appropriate attributions or rectifications.
